translation.Department of Climate Change and Meteoro: Nthambi Yoona za Nyengo ndi Kusintha kwa Nyengo
translation.how.we.started.desc: Kuwelenga zanyengo m'Malawi kunayamba cha m'ma 1890. Mbili ya zanyengo imasungidwa m'ma boma ndi a mipingo, alimi, ndi anthu odzipeleka. Poyamba zanyengo zimayezedwa m'phepete mwa m'tsinje wa Shire komanso m'madera okwela a ku m'mwera. Malo ambili oyezela za nyengo anakhazikitsidwa cha m'ma 1940. Makamaka ku mabwalo a ndege. Ndikupita kwa nthawi nthambi zina monga nthambi ya za ulimi, mitengo, madzi, ndi zamaphunziro zinazindikila kufunika kwa zanyengo. Kotelo nthambi yoona zanyengo inakhazikitsa malo ambili atsopano oyezela zanyengo. Izi zinachitika pofuna kukwanilitsa zofuna za nthambi zosiyanasiyana m'Malawi.
translation.our.mandate.desc: Kuwunika, kulosera ndi kupereka zambiri zokhudza nyengo ndi nyengo zomwe zingathandize pa chitukuko cha chikhalidwe ndi chuma cha dziko.
translation.our.mission.desc: Kupereka ntchito zodalirika, zomvera komanso zapamwamba zanyengo ndi nyengo kuti zikwaniritse dziko, madera ndi udindo wapadziko lonse lapansi kudzera mu kufalitsa munthawi yake zolondola komanso zaposachedwa komanso zidziwitso za chitukuko cha chikhalidwe ndi zachuma.
translation.our.vision.desc: Dziko lochangamuka pothana ndi za Nyengo ndi kusintha kwa Nyengo.
translation.app.and.forecasts.desc:
Appu imapangidwa ndi 
DCCMS - Nthambi Yoona za Nyengo ndi Kusintha kwa Nyengo.

Ma Ulosi onse amaperekedwa ndi DCCMS.
translation.warning.icons.disclaimer: Zizindikiro za machenjezo a za Nyengo zikuchokela ku World Meteorological Organisation.
translation.geographical.data.disclaimer: Maina a malo mu appu atengedwa ku
